name: jira-search
description: Allows you to view your jira issues in visual studio code.

jiraSearch.url.description: Base URL for your jira site - Required

jiraSearch.username.description: Username for your jira account (typically not the email address) - Required

jiraSearch.password.description: Password for your jira account - Required

jiraSearch.labelFormat.description: The first part of an issue listing

jiraSearch.descriptionFormat.description: Second part. Smaller text next to the label. Issue summary by default.

jiraSearch.detailFormat.description: Appears below the label and description. Default is the issue description.

jiraSearch.clipboardFormat.description: Format of data copied to clipboard

jiraSearch.jql.default: assignee={username} and status!=Done order by created
jiraSearch.jql.description: JQL used to fetch issues. Only the {username} token is currently supported.

jiraSearch.updateInterval.description: How often to update local issue cache (in minutes)

jiraSearch.enableWorklogs.description: Experimental: View and add worklogs. Does not work with third party plugins such as Tempo.
